column4: lzinucs: when im assigning the keystrokes, it registers ctrl+ and then it just ignores left click, how else could I assign it ?
lzinucs: they arent as friendly over there ;)
coz: system settings>desktop>desktop effects>all effects>desktop cube>activation
if you want it to be left click the assignment should be ctrl+Button1
coz: how can I assign button 1 if it just ignores input from button 1 during assignment?
ah  ok  mmm   I dont know.. i havent installed kde for a few months so my skills with troubleshooting are not sharp enough...I would go to either #kubuntu if this is ubuntu or  #kde
coz: thanks anyways, Ive asked in there. not so helpful
just for info...type the firts 2 or 3  letters of the person's name you are talking to then hit the tab button to complete it
now i just have to figure out how to change my name ;-)
